system.description: You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kh26gom04osoo005]{Dancing Lights} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z7r6plq6vyesck07]{Faerie Fire} once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zlsdqrnf2t9thns7]{Pass Without Trace} once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them our spellcasting ability for them is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, whichever is highest.
